messages.subject: Fwd: searching for homeschooling families
messages.messageBody:
>X-Sender: mhegener@...
>Date: Wed, 7 Mar 2001 16:41:44 -0800
>To: HEM-Editor@...
>From: Kathryn Meyer <kam@...> (by way of Home Education Magazine)
>Subject: searching for homeschooling families
>
>I am a Littleton, Colorado, homeschooling mother working on a book
>about homeschooling families and the home-based businesses they own
>and operate. At this time I am looking for families to interview who
>are engaged in both pursuits. Anyone interested may email me to
>receive a questionnaire by return email; if the family would not
>mind potentially being contacted by phone, please include a phone
>number as well. All families highlighted in the book will receive a
>free copy at publication time.
>
>I appreciate you making this available to your readership. If you
>have any questions for me, please don't hesitate to write back.
